yarn it s like working with a cloud it s a great gift or market item for shops that sell beanies if you are a little nervous about crocheting this beanie or the matching sweaters don t worry i ve got you the macchiato sweater & hat crochet patterns come with video tutorials 2 **pattern pack discounts** use code save10 for 10% off two patterns save15 for 15% off 3 patterns save20 for 20% off 4 or more patterns cannot be combined with other offers **crochet hook ** 6 0 mm j furls hook 3 **notions ** yarn needle scissors **yarn ** wonderfluff by wecrochet 4 -in finnley heather bulky weight yarn **yardage ** baby 80 yds 73 m toddler 90 yds 82 m child 100 yds 91 m teen 115 yds 105 m adult 125 yds 114 m **abbreviations/stitches ** chain- chain rs- right side single_crochet- single_crochet slip_stitch- slip_stitch sts- stitches ws- wrong side **gauge** 13 5 single_crochet sts and 15 row = 4 with h-hook **measurements/sizes ** head circumference baby 14-16 toddler 16-18 child 18-20 teen
